metadata.name: Persistence Via TypedPaths - CommandLine
metadata.comment: Detects modification addition to the 'TypedPaths' key in the user or admin registry via the commandline. Which might indicate persistence attempt

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\software\\\\microsoft\\\\windows\\\\currentversion\\\\explorer\\\\typedpaths')))

output.summary: Detects modification addition to the 'TypedPaths' key in the user or admin registry via the commandline. Which might indicate persistence attempt
